name: Complex Multi-Field Extraction - IL Auto Progressive
description: Complex test case with multiple fields: vehicles, drivers, mileage
input: I need auto insurance in Illinois. I have 3 vehicles: a 2021 Ford F-150, a 2019 Toyota Camry, and a 2020 Honda CR-V. There are 3 drivers in my household including me. I'm 36 years old. I drive about 12,000 miles per year for work. I have a clean driving record and good credit score around 750.

expectedRoute.rationale: Progressive offers auto insurance in Illinois and handles multi-vehicle policies well.
